author: whypauliwhyy
text: sends me to the ninth cloud, makes me believe in love again. it helps me escape the reality, even when im just sitting on my window pane, oblivious to everything going on around me but just focused on one thing: im home again. so yeah, this is why i love harry potter

author: whypauliwhyy
text: i feel the tension lifting off my shoulders and my back, it feels home. the sweet visualisation of Hogwarts in my mind's eye when i read about the deserted corridors or the snow covered castle, it feels like home. the way we think the boys might love us,
